definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="114" y="110"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="403">Treat energy costs differently for Glass Armor, since the full set must be worn to cost energy.</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">EnergyVialActiveArmorPieces</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="procedure_retval_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">IsWearingGlassArmorFullSet</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_number"><value name="return"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">GlassArmorEnergyCost</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_number"><value name="return"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">StandardEffectArmorEnergyCost</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
